comments: I took a course rom her at Walden University...every student I met at the colloquium hated her. i I had not registered prior, I would not have taken her... Horrible teacher! Needs serious people skills! Mean, uncaring...
She is rude uncaring, mean, unapproachable, poor teacher. She teaches at other online schools..If you see her name RUN, RUN, RUN
Uncaring, rude, focused on facilitating, not learner centered at all!

This professor lacks the ability to be clear about what you need to do in order to make good grades. Very curt in her responses to problems within the classroom. Openly partial toward certain students. I would never take a class from her knowing what I know now.

Elaine is knowledgeable and responsive. I took an online class from Elaine via Capella. She does a nice job and is very present in the discussion boards. She seems to be constantly looking for ways to make her courses even better. Nice work.
Unhelpful. Just tells you you made a mistake, but not how to correct it. Didn\'t teach the class and barely facilitated it. Very little interaction with students.
Try to find a different instructor
This professor seemed annoyed when asked questions, and short in her reponses. Feedback was unclear, often didn\'t relate to the discussion. Not good...

Survey of Research Methodology - Extremely rigid & seemed quite grumpy. More interested in how students attend to the specifics of her instructions rather on quality/depth of understanding of material. Don\'t bother spending days doing research or studying. Just stay in her bounds. Very negative and sketchy feedback. Interesting subject though.

Ended up dropping the class in Week 8; as there was no way my GPA of 4.0 would withstand the stress created by this instructor. Questions went unanswered, problems with new platform not accomodated; very frustrating!
Definately not about mastery learning - but you know where you stand. Too attentive.
